name: What-da-ya-have
body: Group project in which we utilized jQuery/Ajax and used 3 API's to create an application that would give restaurants in close proximity to Marta Stations as well as the train schedule and local weather.

name: Fitness Tracker
body: I used NPM packages(Express, Mongoose, Morgan, and Nodemon) to build an application that will view create and track the name, type, weight, sets, reps, and duration of daily workouts.

name: Budget Tracker
body: This app uses Mongodb, Express.js and the Service Worker, Manifest, and Caching used in a PWA.

name: Eat-Da-Burger!
body: This assignment involved using express to create routes and utilizing the Handlebars HTML template engine. This site was deployed to Heroku.
